title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: Currently, there is no UI option available to define the default line delimiters for new files in the preferences section.
EB: The software should provide a user interface option in the preferences section to define the default line delimiters for new files.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the software.
2. Go to the preferences section.
3. Look for an option that allows setting the default line delimiters for new files.
4. Observe that there is no such option available.
